originalText.text: I have had the pleasure of having Dr Mandor and his professional staff providing me with excellent dental care for a few years now. From making my appointment with the well mannered office personnel ,to receiving whatever treatment I am schedule for by the pleasantly well attired professional in the private clean well lit room cannot be characterized as anything else but another one of New York's very best experiences. Like so much people I have encountered the dentist office was never one of my fan favorite so as a result I had work to be done. From day one the experience in Dr Mandor's office was one of active listening, gratitude to me and and all around mutual respect.  Every one of my questions were answered and additional informations were provided when necessary. Cearly i walked into this office there was noting theatrical just and honest hard working dentist with his team of workers giving the best dental care I have ever received.

originalText.text: Terrific dentist ... This was my best boss ever.  Great work very kind and gentle. Dr Mandor Rocks

originalText.text: Wonderful experience, comfortable office, and amazing staff.
